alert.note: Alert for Coastal Gulf; Inland Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 6:10AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN GULF COUNTY THROUGH 700 AM EDT/600 AM CDT/... At 610 AM EDT/510 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Port St. Joe, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Port St. Joe, Milltown, Highland View, St Joseph State Park, Cape San Blas, Indian Pass, Simmons Bayou, Jones Homestead, Ward Ridge, Saint Joe Beach, and White City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
